pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable Selection in PH Cure Model with Time-Varying Covariates // Implementation of the semi-parametric proportional-hazards (PH) of Sy and Taylor (2000) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2000.00227.x extended to time-varying covariates. Estimation and variable selection are based on the methodology described in Beretta and Heuchenne (2019) doi:10.1080/02664763.2018.1554627; confidence intervals of the parameter estimates may be computed using a bootstrap approach. Moreover, data following the PH cure model may be simulated using a method similar to Hendry (2014) doi:10.1002/sim.5945, where the event-times are generated on a continuous scale from a piecewise exponential distribution conditional on time- varying covariates.
